title: Juno is bringing Jupiter’s moon Io into sharper focus
description: NASA's Juno probe wasn't designed for this.

title: How an unpatched Microsoft Exchange 0-day likely caused one of the UK’s biggest hacks ever
description: Evidence appears to show a critical 0-day tracked as ProxyNotShell was exploited.

title: Twitter held in contempt, fined $350K over Trump data delay
description: Trump accused the DOJ of "secretly attacking" his Twitter account.

title: Supreme Court denies Epic’s request to open up App Store payments during appeals
description: Apple's Supreme Court petition will decide if it can hold onto all app payments.

title: Mars rover finds signs of seasonal floods
description: It's an exciting find because wet/dry cycles may be central to pre-life chemistry.

title: “Downfall” bug affects years of Intel CPUs, can leak encryption keys and more
description: Researchers also disclosed a separate bug called "Inception" for newer AMD CPUs.

title: Hydrogen-powered planes almost ready for takeoff
description: Companies are readying hardware but differ dramatically in how they're testing it.

title: Amazon won’t stop sending tortured woman unwanted boxes of shoes
description: Fifty unwanted Amazon packages arrived in two months, mostly containing shoes.

title: Getting AAA games working in Linux sometimes requires concealing your GPU
description: Hogwarts Legacy must be conned to avoid crashing itself with XeSS upscaling.

title: Cadillac reveals the 2025 Escalade IQ, one excessive EV
description: 450 miles of range, 24-inch wheels, and a price tag starting around $130,000.

title: Next-gen OSDP was supposed to make it harder to break in to secure facilities. It failed.
description: OSDP Secure Channel has yet to gain widespread usage, and it's already broken.

title: The race to save Florida’s coral reef from hot ocean waters
description: Coral reef nurseries are being moved to deeper waters—or back into giant tanks on land.

title: How we host Ars, the finale and the 64-bit future
description: We wrap up our four-part series by tying up loose ends and looking ahead.

title: NASA’s Artemis II crew meets their Moonship
description: NASA's Orion spacecraft is taking a bit longer to prepare for its first crew flight.
